title: Manager, Trade Marketing, Foot Inc. - Sports Equipment
text: Make Your Passion Your Career. â„¢ Work In Sports. Region Map Here is the job that interests you: Manager, Trade Marketing, Foot Inc. Sports Equipment Posted/Updated: 10-07-2015 Brief Job Description: Contribute to the development of US Brand Activation plan by creating a cohesive channel strategy for Foot Locker Inc. and each account under its umbrella; brief, develop, and deliver all seasonal marketing tools for Foot Locker Inc. in completion and on time.   Since your site launched in 2000, WorkInSports.com has been the go to place for USA Baseball when we are looking to fill full-time openings and internships. Your reputation throughout the sports industry as a vital tool for job seekers and employers is well deserved. Thanks again! David Perkins
